name: Telecommunication content management
title: website
summary: In 2011, I began working on this project as a freelancer, starting with the creation of a custom design, logo, and template.
explain:
In 2011, I began working on this project as a freelancer, starting with the creation of a custom design, logo, and template.

This project was developed to manage various aspects of telecommunication systems, such as station information, building segments, and mast conditions. Additional capabilities included saving station locations on Google Maps and visualizing optical fiber routes.

One of the most notable aspects of this project is a customized JavaScript component that enables users to draw scalable vector shapes and structural layouts directly within the application.

Project features :

- Manage route, building, and reporting

- Manage stations and locations on the map (Google map API)

- Manage personnel

- Manage news

- Manage plans

- Manage site review

- Manage viewer
